text: So her Lord accepted her with a good acceptance and made her (Mary) grow into a good growth and gave her into the guardianship of Zechariah. Whenever Zechariah entered the sanctuary to (see) her, he found provision (food) with her, he said, "O Mary! from where (does) this (provision) come to you?" She said, "It is from (that which is ) with God." God certainly provides without measure to whom He wills
